product_name: Big Agnes Super Scout UL 2 Tent
long_description: Sporting an enormous vestibule, the 3-season, 2-person, single-wall Super Scout UL 2 tent uses your trekking poles (not included) to set up. Carry about a pound per person for this waterproof shelter.
short_description: Sporting an enormous vestibule, the 3-season, 2-person, single-wall Super Scout UL 2 tent uses your trekking poles (not included) to set up. Carry about a pound per person for this waterproof shelter.
